snippet: The yogurt maker conceded defeat in its standoff with the Russian government, which refused to allow a shipment of the Greek yogurt bound for the United States Olympic team to enter the country.
abstract: Yogurt maker Chobani concedes defeat in its standoff with the Russian government, which has refused to allow a shipment of the Greek yogurt intended for the United States Olympic team to enter the country; company says it will donate the yogurt to food banks.
lead_paragraph: The yogurt maker conceded defeat in its standoff with the Russian government, which refused to allow a shipment of the Greek yogurt bound for the United States Olympic team to enter the country.

headline.main: Greek Yogurt Meant for Olympians Will Be Donated, Chobani Says
headline.print_headline: Chobani Set to Donate Yogurt Meant for Sochi
